Title: Binding from Five Poems (Quintet)
Description: This non-original binding from Walters manuscript W.611 probably dates to the early 13th century AH/AD 19th. The binding is composed of lacquer with floral design in the main and outer panels, as well as central oval medallions and pendants. The binding has no flap.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Qajar; Book; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Ibrahim [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; [partly visible seal impression dated [1]230 (?) AH on fol. 1a]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Anonymous
